name: Jigsaw Guru - Magic Block Puzzles Game
name_original: Jigsaw Guru - Magic Block Puzzles Game
description:
Jigsaw Guru is great for puzzlers of all ages!

Discover a colorful world of jigsaw puzzles that fits in your pocket!

You can simply adjust the difficulty of all the puzzles. Download it now!

===== FEATURES
• Play from our collection of beautiful, high quality images!
• A new FREE puzzle every day!!
• Constantly updated puzzle packs
• Turn your personal photos into your own custom puzzles!
• Play large puzzles!
• Music soundtracks
• Optionally rotate pieces for a greater challenge
• Share completed puzzles with your friends
• Game Center leaderboards -- Compete with your friends!
